Felix Jeckel | Portfolio
Web and App Developer . I did the Ironhack Bootcamp in Berlin. Self-learner with skills in React, React Native, Javascript, MongoDB, Express, Node.js, HTML, CSS.

Portfolio

About

Hi, I'm Felix, nice to meet you. I am a Web Developer from Berlin. I learned through the Ironhack Bootcamp, Codecadamy, Freecodecamp and many other resources.

Please get in touch with me if you're interested in working with me. I also appreciate feedback about the portfolio or my code.

Around the Web

Credits

freecodecampe Front End Libraries Certificate

Developer Certification, representing approximately 300 hours of coursework. Amongst other things, topics were; Bootstrap, jQuery, Sass, React, Redux, 5 sample projects.

  • Link: https://www.freecodecamp.org/certification/watnfoehn/front-end-libraries
  • Date: April 2020

freecodecampe Responsive Web Design Certificate

Developer Certification, representing approximately 300 hours of coursework. Amongst other things, topics were; HTML, HTML 5, CSS, accessibility, flexbox, grid, 5 sample projects.

  • Link: https://www.freecodecamp.org/certification/watnfoehn/responsive-web-design
  • Date: October 2019

Carrot Love

Realized with the MERN Stack and grommet.io as library. Also Google Login and the Open Farm API are integrated. This is the final project of the Ironhack Bootcamp, I realized it with a partner and we had 8 days of time.

  • Link: https://carrotlove.herokuapp.com
  • GitHub Repository: https://github.com/MattStaudinger/carrot-love
  • Date: December 2018

Portfolio

I host my portfolio on firebase. It's built with Jekyll and get's deployed automatically with GitHub actions.

  • Link: http://felixjeckel.de/
  • Date: November 2018

Amalgamate

After five weeks of the Ironhack Bootcamp we had the chance to build an app. This is an icebreaking network for closed groups (such as a Bootcamp cohort) to get to know each other faster. We used Express, node, MongoDB and more. We had time for five days.

  • Link: http://amalgamate.herokuapp.com
  • GitHub Repository: https://github.com/watnFoehn/amalga_mate
  • Date: November 2018

Ironfarm

This game was developed by me after two weeks in the Ironhack Bootcamp. It's build with jQuery, JavaScript, HTML and CSS. It's controlled with arrow keys and control.

  • Link: https://watnfoehn.github.io/Ironfarm/
  • GitHub Repository: https://github.com/watnFoehn/Ironfarm
  • Date: October 2018

einpaarminuten

This is the personal blog of my girlfriend. It's realized with WordPress, theme and plugins. I am the admin of this project.

  • Link: https://einpaarminuten.de/
  • Date: May 2018

wortskizze

This is my personal playground. I put here whatever I want. Mostly it's poems, writings and experiments. It's a Wordpress blog.

  • Link: https://wortskizze.wordpress.com/
  • Date: Juni 2014
